content:
Dear all,

Lancaster University, United Kingdom, has 2 postdoc openings which require machine learning and AI expertise (please, see below). One of them is explicitly on Trustworthy Autonomous Systems (a £3M project).

  • Senior Research Associate/ Research Associate: Prognostic modelling of electric battery ageing
  • Senior Research Associate in Security (Design, Assessment, Verification/Validation, Adversarial Machine Learning/ML)
Job Opportunity at Lancaster University: Senior Research Associate in Security (Design, Assessment, Verification/Validation, Adversarial Machine Learning/ML)
We are seeking a Senior Research Associate to join our team as part of the £3M EPSRC Trustworthy Autonomous Systems Security node (TAS-S) at Lancaster University. This position is open to both UK-based and international applicants. We seek...
